sense.gloss: chazuke, cooked rice with green tea poured on it

sdata.j: ↑普段↑↓ふだん↓あまり↑食↑↓た↓べないのに、お|↑茶漬↑↓ちゃづ↓け|をさらさらと↑食↑↓た↓べているコマーシャルを↑見↑↓み↓ると、↑無性↑↓むしょう↓に↑食↑↓た↓べたくなってしまう。
sdata.e: I don't usually eat it, but because I saw the commercial where the person was slurping down ochazuke, it made me really crave it.
